author: Juli Clover
title: Apple to Overhaul TV App, Remove Standalone Apps from Apple TV
description: Apple plans to overhaul the TV app in an effort to consolidate its Apple TV+ streaming service and its standalone movie and TV show purchase options, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. A tvOS update in December will introduce the changes that Apple has pla…
